name: pigheadedness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or act of unreasonably refusing to change your plan or opinion, or to listen to different opinions: Critics accused them of pigheadedness. Water restrictions are a result of the government's incompetence and pigheadedness regarding the building of dams. See
pigheaded
More examplesFewer examplesThere was a limit to even my pigheadedness.Are you so insecure about your own authority that you would resort to this level of pigheadedness?It is easy to assume that the mistakes were simply due to individual pigheadedness.
